title: US agency updates AI procurement guidance
summary: Federal procurement guidance added clearer language for safety and evaluation requirements in AI-enabled systems.

title: New benchmark report highlights agent reliability gaps
summary: A benchmark summary compared multi-step agent reliability and found substantial regressions under long-horizon tasks.

title: Open model release notes emphasize reproducibility
summary: Release notes focused on transparent training metadata and reproducibility checklists for downstream teams.

title: Alignment workshop consolidates red-team learnings
summary: Workshop findings collected common prompt-injection and tool misuse failure modes with practical mitigations.

title: Enterprise rollout expands model usage controls
summary: A major enterprise AI rollout introduced stricter usage controls, audit logs, and default policy templates.

title: Inference optimization update lowers serving cost
summary: A cloud vendor published improvements in inference efficiency that reduce latency and compute cost at scale.
